attributes.action: 90p tax bracket for the very wealthy
attributes.additional_details:
Introduce a 90p tax bracket for all personal earnings above £150,000 per annum. This, in conjunction with an effective closing of all tax loopholes and safe havens would raise funds for the public good from those that can most afford it.

This policy will in part attempt to lessen the massive rift between the very very wealthy and the rest of society; with funds raised potentially being targeted at giving the very poorest in our society better education and job opportunities.
